short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Place and share sticky notes on webpages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sticky notes extension for chrome. Stick notes onto websites for remembering and collecting information. Quickly jot down ideas and save time. Best way to annotate webpages.

Key features:
Sticky Notes: Place sticky notes on x, y coordinates. Notes are autosaved using chromes local storage and are never sent over the internet unless you choose to share them with others.

Share Notes: Share your notes with others by optionally uploading them. Copy the invitation link and send to friends so they can view notes on the site you've shared.

Browse Notes: View all notes you've saved across websites for easy access. 

Create a new note by clicking the extension icon

The sticky notes are semi-transparent, making them perfect for annotating webpages.

Next Update Planned Features
- Persistent highlights
- Add comments sticking to element / highlight
- Improved YouTube notes
